website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, warm beanie that produces great sound. Quality is comparable to others that come at higher price points.
pros: Offers lots of nice features for a price competitors can't top, including warm knit material, clear sound, and a comfortably snug fit

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Genius! These make the keeping your head warm and listening to music seamless. We have some people who are vehemently against earbuds and they have told me that the sound is supreme. Also, you don’t have to turn the sound all the way up to hear it loud and clear. My only word of caution is if it comes in a bigger size, if you have a fro like me, get the biggest available size or get your hair braided, lol. The pic is of my teenage son wearing them. Fits an average head circumference perfectly. I love these and for that price I might buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Naima

customer_reviews.title: Great concept with no cords to worry about, comfortable warm hat, decent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice fitting hat decent sounding speakers. No cords to worry about are great stays put better than traditional headphones. I look forward to using this outdoors when hiking etc. I love multipurpose tools/items. I would recommend at the moment not certain how rugged it will be but I will put it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: The Lover

customer_reviews.title: Just in time for the snow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This beanie is awesome! People dont even notice when I'm hearing music. The sound is great for the price and setting it up was easy with the instructions it came with. Love that its rechargeable as well. I will be buying more for the whole family. Another thing i like about it is the size of the speakers, they are so small you can't even notice they are there. Cool toy for music lovers.
customer_reviews.author: El Chuyito

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat is comfortable to wear,even though it's a bit big on me, has great sound quality and pairs well quickly with my phone, it comes up as BT-01 to pair with, it flashes red and blue until connected, press the the play button to turn on and off. The (+) and (-) change the songs (at least when pairs on Amazon music) a great hat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone who dislikes earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up even for a techno-challenged old fart like me. The battery lasts plenty long enough for the walks I take (3-4 miles), and I simply plug it in at home, so I don't expect any issues on that score. I really, really dislike using earbuds--they fall out or shift and change the input volume. I've been wearing this hat on my daily walks and it's terrific. So much easier than the headphones I was using. The only downside is that I can only use it in cool weather otherwise the hat gets too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Barber (Author)

customer_reviews.text: I was really worried this hat was going to be made out of a weird material or sit awkwardly on the head, but it is a very nice hat and the speakers are clear. The mic is maybe a little TOO good because it seems to pick up every little sound during a phone call haha. You can take the ear pieces out to wash the hat. It charges fast and lasts all day. My SO works in concrete pumping and has this on under his hardhat at work all day and he absolutely loves it. I plan on getting another so we can both take them snowboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Lexa

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I have owned one other beanie (different brand) with built in earphones and I loved it. After several years of use in the winter, it finally stopped working. I guess I got lucky with my first purchase. This hat had a very poor sound quality. I was disappointed and returned it. I am pretty easy to please but there was no way I would have enjoyed a walk with this one. I guess I got lucky with my first purchase. No problems with return, however. So that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: a mom's thoughts on this hat
customer_reviews.text: This is not like ear buds built into the hat, the hat is more like a personal speaker. People who are within a close proximity will also be able to hear your music/audio. The hat is made with great quality and has comfort and style to match. I bought 2 of these and gave them as gifts to my teenage kids... a son and a daughter. Both loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Heishman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my brother for Christmas. Accidentally gave the bag it was in to my chiropractor (that’ll teach me to use matching bags). Chiropractor loves it though! Told me he used it snowboarding and to walk his dog all winter. Works great! Super clear volume and warm at the same time. Should have bought one for myself. And bonus, I’ve now become a favorite of my chiropractor and get my deductibles covered!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Groenewoud

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfect for my iPhone, I can listen to music or talk to someone while having my hands completely free and I can also be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Haegele

customer_reviews.title: These things are great
customer_reviews.text: I work automotive and there's lots of noise here and if I turn them all the way up I can't hear anything else. Just to let you know how loud they can get. They're nice and warm too and comfortable battery life last my whole shift there's a spot for easy charging. Looks like a normal beanie unless someone reads the patch that has what the buttons do.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R.

customer_reviews.title: For the cold months in Texas.
customer_reviews.text: I have mentioned I have a lot of bluetooth headsets around. I purchased this one just to test it out and it actually is not that bad. No issues connecting however the sound quality is not that great (which I expected and am OK with). The battery life is average and charging time is about the same. My only complaint is that after using it for about an hour your head gets itchy. Not sure if it is the material, the heat, however it is an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Ark.Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I wish I had gotte this last winter! I was Dogs all day here in the Northeast and this hat is awesome! The speaker is great and the phone call quality is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: goose

customer_reviews.title: COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. It is more comfortable than I thought it would be. Gives me a feeling of freedom to be able to move around and hear music without cords. I saw that some others said the volume was not loud enough. It is plenty loud enough for me. I'm using it right now as I write this review and I am really enjoying it! Great value for the cost, also. It came fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: kin

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it for running
customer_reviews.text: I got this as sort of a gag gift to fill out Christmas for my husband but to my surprise he really loves it and it is actually pretty nice. The hat itself is thick and well made. And the speakers are easy to pair and to my complete shock actually sound OK for Bluetooth headphones. Overall I'm glad I grabbed this last minute he really loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: The beanie is super comfy and cute! I do think the little square bit is a little awkward feeling but it's not uncomfortable or anything. The music sounds fine but I'm not an audiophile so people that are pickier about their earphones/headphones might disagree with me. All the cables are detachable in case you want to wash this beanie! It does keep my head warm and it covers your ears which is nice against any strong winds. Would recommend to friends that are not audiophiles and need to keep warm!
customer_reviews.author: KazeMizuki

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, so I can't comment on the sound quality. However the hat is very nice, and it was comfortable when I tried it on. It has a little hole inside the hat where you can remove the speakers for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lomoe

customer_reviews.title: What a great Hat
customer_reviews.text: This was my husbands favorite Christmas gift. The hat is thick and warm for those cold winter days. Connecting the hat to his device took less than 5 minutes and it holds a really good charge. We charged it out of the box and didn’t need to charge it again for nearly a week and that was with him using it daily. The volume is great and the connections are easy to remove when we are ready to wash it! You will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawny84

customer_reviews.title: Really good-looking, durable, and functional
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend for Christmas because we run in the early morning and it is chilly. He usually plays his music through earbuds that don't really fit under a beanie. This was the perfect solution and would very well. The gloves were an added bouns!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Boyle

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!! GREAT VOLUME!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this as a gift for my husband and had to purchase it a second time as the first one was accidentally lost. I can say that the sound quality and volume of this is impressive! I can be walking next to him and be able to hear his music. He's a musician and hard to impress but he really loved this one!
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Solano

customer_reviews.title: This is a good hat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. When he was looking what he wanted he read all reviews of all the different hats and decided (after I bought this one) he didn't want one of these hats. Totally bummed I gave it to him anyway. He ended up loving it! He uses it on a daily basis at work.
customer_reviews.author: s. hart

customer_reviews.title: Makes Skiing Much More Fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good sound, simple to connect to your phone via bluetooth. Warm but not bulky...fit easily under a ski helmet. It's not too hard to find the charge plug through the "button hole" provided. I've only used for several hours, so I can't speak to battery life or reliability, but happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: This gift won Christmas, I bought it for my boyfriend and he was so astounded and impressed! He pretty much lives in his headphones, so this is a much sleeker and more comfortable option! The sound is clear and very loud, though others can't hear a thing!
customer_reviews.author: Boss Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Make instruction booklet cover unisex . Both my gifts had females and my gift are for males .
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give this a stAr rating as of yet because I purchased 2 of these as gifts for friends . I have a question about the instruction booklet . If this is a unisex gift why is there a lady on the cover of the booklet ? My purchases were both for males and I’m sure they will question this . Please try to change the cover and maybe put a symbol or something neutral / unisex so it does not confuse people. By the way , thank you for the free gift that was added with these hats . Will advise about the actual product once I get feedback from recipients.
customer_reviews.author: Rebtekas

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat. It is warm and the sound quality is good. I bought it because my husband almost lost an AirPod shoveling snow last winter. He uses this for dog walks and shoveling. It was a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This prodeuct was perfect especially for teenagers who lose something everyday. This also forces him to wear a hat which I am happy with. Sounds great and isn't to loud that he can't hear his surroundings. So faf so good
customer_reviews.author: CocoaKJ

customer_reviews.title: Very upset!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product (as a gift) I thought it was the coolest thing! Bought it early to get my Christmas shopping out of the way. The person who has it now, hasn’t even opened the gift and had it for a month, and there’s a huge hole on the top of the beanie!!! Unfortunately I cannot return it because I bought it October for a Christmas gift! Such bs! Horrible and don’t even know who to reach out to about it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Comstock

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is awesome! I got it for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! It's durable and seems like it will last a long time. The only thing I don't like about it is that it doesn't stay charged for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well!
customer_reviews.text: First, I rarely if ever write reviews. However, I am enjoying this product so much that I felt compelled to tell you about it. It’s excellent! Fits great, the sound is clear and loud enough to drown out the noisy machines where I work, and the battery lasts a full 9 1/2 hrs. This is all based on first impressions as I’ve just started using this beanie. Hopefully it will last in the long run but so far so good. I’d be happy to recommend to friends and family which is certainly a ringing endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: ralis24

customer_reviews.title: Gifts- recipients used and liked
customer_reviews.text: Alright- stocking stuffers and the guys likes them- especially during snow shoveling- one receiver had a difficult time setting up Bluetooth- the speaker box by ear seemed a little bulky but fit is loose enough for there to be no issue
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Heon

customer_reviews.title: Teenager approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son LOVES this! He can even take calls through it... isn’t user friendly to make calls(that he’s discovered)... but keeps his head warm and has all his friends asking me to send the link to their moms, as they want one too.
customer_reviews.author: BirdLady

customer_reviews.title: Good Review
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother and my teen nephews and the review they love it! Sound is good and can here on the phone both ways. I couldnt hear what they were playing standing next to them. Cant say enough just wish it was easier to charge.
customer_reviews.author: DAR

customer_reviews.title: Works great great value
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas because he is forever working outside as we live on a farm and he absolutely loves it and says it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shar Mecca

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat and the batteries last a good while too. We have 3 or 4 around the house
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Beanie
customer_reviews.text: This beanie keeps your head warm and has great sound. I bought it to wear under my helmet when boarding but it's a little too bulky for that. Still a great beanie though. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: All 5 stars. Easy to connect.. Great sound. I wish they had a lighter weight version because I look silly wearing a knit hat in 90 degree temperature. I still wear it....
customer_reviews.author: Mr Barter

customer_reviews.title: Nice beanie
customer_reviews.text: This poor little beanie only lasted a few weeks before it was mistakenly washed. Made us very sad. It was a gift for my boyfriend and he wore it a lot, often choosing the beanie over his Bose wireless headphones. Will re Oder one again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kadey bayard

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This hat was much nicer than expected. Also, I hadn't considered how to clean it if needed and was impressed that the speakers can easily be removed and then reinsert!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he LOVES it. The sound is remarkable! I would have never imagined they would sound so nice. Amazing gift idea and I might just buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela arguello

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Dad loved this gift for Christmas he works outside a lot and is constantly trying to keep headphones in his ears so hopefully this will help him
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Too small for an adult male.
customer_reviews.text: My head is probably bigger than average. If your head is also bigger than average, this will not fit you well. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this beanie. It was a gift for my husband. Unfortunately it’s a bit small for his head which was disappointing. He’s 6’ and not a huge guy but this was definitely made for a slim framed individual other than that it’s unique and worth the price. I wouldn’t recommend for anyone who wear a size Large or above.
customer_reviews.author: FitDiamond

customer_reviews.title: Super sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a gift and he loves it! One of his vehicles is an older truck that doesn’t have Bluetooth and he is thrilled to be able to use this to talk hands free while driving! No background noise at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot. Good sound quality. Holds a charge for a long time. I work outdoors and hate having something stuck in my ear to take a phone call or listen to music. Price is great
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Great for biking or other outdoor sports!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bluetooth beanie winter music hat for my brother who is really into biking. He loves it and can't wait for winter!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Is an xmas gift, so hoping it holds up to reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This is an xmas gift, so hasn't been used yet. It looks good and the good reviews led me to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a stocking stuffer and my son (in his late 20s) loves it. Fits and works great! Wondering why this is not a best seller and at all stores...yes, that good of a product!
customer_reviews.author: jaz

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the loudness
customer_reviews.text: Clear sound, easy to use. Bought it for my husband when we does yard work so he doesn’t have to struggle with regular earphones. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula copas

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat and is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My grandson said that the hat is a little too big for him but he wears it in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Sansone

customer_reviews.title: It’s good quality and very comfortable compared with the price love it thanks
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item looks very good quality plus looks so chic it’s gift for my husband and I can’t wait to gift to him to try and I will buy one more for my son too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. I had no idea it came with gloves. He loves it, says sound is great ! Glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Joy C.

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 2
customer_reviews.text: I received one for Christmas last year and loved it until it had to be charged for the second time. The red light comes on indicating it's being charged but then it doesnt turn on (no matter how long I press the on/off button). This year, my fiance ordered this style without realizing it's from the same company. This one turns on fine but my Samsung Galaxy phone can't connect to it. I will be trying to return the new one and try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, durable
customer_reviews.text: I got one for my husband and 12 year son. They both love them and the sound quality is much better than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: L. Verret

customer_reviews.title: Good gifts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 as Christmas gifts. The people that received them seemed to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Jacquette

customer_reviews.title: Ordered another one.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my teen son. He stated that the sound is incredible and the hat would be perfect for outdoor activities where he would be hesitant to use his AirPods. My teen daughter immediately asked for one as well.
customer_reviews.author: TSO

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for in the winter. When you want to listen to music and keep your ears warm at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Claggett

customer_reviews.title: Built in head phones bulky and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband found the built in headphones to be very uncomfortable . Too bad because otherwise nice material and a good fit
customer_reviews.author: paula pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not great, would pay for better quality
customer_reviews.text: The hat fits well and sounds pretty good, but the mic does not work well/sound clear on the receiving end. The hat also frequently disconnects from my phone at random moments. I recommend paying more for higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SOUND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS ALL AROUND AWESOME! GREAT SOUND QUALITY AND IT FITS VERY WELL
customer_reviews.author: Britnee

customer_reviews.title: Puts the FUN in Functional
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting hat that has good sound and is easy to use. Can hear the music and what's around me. Much better than headphones.
customer_reviews.author: ItsJoMomma

customer_reviews.title: Stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes it! He was surprised with the volume and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my boyfriend...
customer_reviews.text: He likes it and it works good. He works outside often and under houses. He can still listen to his books or music while working and driving.
customer_reviews.author: LifesMyPuzzle

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend skis and is allllllways listening to music! This will be perfect for the slopes!
customer_reviews.author: TheNeener

customer_reviews.title: Best value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Good sound. Amazed how well it works with phone calls. A couple things I would change/add. Easier access for charging plug; indicator on amount of charge; and cosmetically I would have preferred black instead of tan button patch. Overall, it's well worth price.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Azevedo, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Read before used the hat
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Just arrived the hat is cute and warm also the gloves Thank you so much. 🙏🙏🙏🙏
customer_reviews.author: ADRIANA ORJUELA

customer_reviews.title: Gifts
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, I bought 2 for Christmas gifts. Both recipients liked them, but I can’t give a review on How well they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old nephew loved it and it connected to his phone right away. Easy, Comfy, Good product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsWallace96

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the hat and the quality of the material!! Waiting to try the speakers- but I imagine they will be of same quality as the hat itself!
customer_reviews.author: Meredyth

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This made a FANTASTIC gift for my 16yr old son! He LOVES it! Arrived on time and good follow up by seller!
customer_reviews.author: Tina J Grover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Amazon Find!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an awesome find . Very durable , comfortable and well fitting. The blue tooth works well as i expected it to and my teenage boys love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased I think six or seven of these heads for Christmas not one complaint everyone loves it only problem it's very difficult to communicate on your phone through the hat because the mic is too short it plays music really really well I tried to purchase a few more was unable to since changed the price.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Contains sound Inside hat with limited sound outside, good fit to hat for standard adult.
customer_reviews.author: Miche

customer_reviews.title: Comfy + Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very great christmas present, husband was showing off the beanie
customer_reviews.author: jinxy903

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he LOVES IT. The hat is warm and the sound quality is great. I steal it for winter running all the time 😉
customer_reviews.author: Shay Samame

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for gifts for my brother, brother-n-law and my nephews and they all loved them! The sound quality is great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Looks awful but gave us some good laughs
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible. Bought it as a gift for my bf and we could not stop laughing about how awful it looked on. Definitely didn’t fit like a normal beanie. saving for white elephant
customer_reviews.author: lmark

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for Christmas and he LOVES it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: A big hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. Easy to use and good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked the sound quality and that he could use it to talk on his phone. He thinks the beanie is a bit too large, but my son told him that is how they are worn now.
customer_reviews.author: Rcoop17

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: They love it! I bought three beanies for the men in my life for Christmas. It was getting cold and this beanie they can keep their heads warm, and listen to their music. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tonja Davis

customer_reviews.title: Louder than other ones I have bought!
customer_reviews.text: Great louder sound. Better than other ones I bought !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Connected to phone right away. The fit and comfort is great. And the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: denea

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Speakers a little bulky and look and feel weird but for the price cant go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stocking stuffer for my husband. He says it is comfortable and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for teenager
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a Christmas gift for my teenage son - and he has worn it daily since receiving it. It was considered his best gift of the season - over STEAM gift cards! He is a musician, and says the sound quality is very good, the hat is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jujube4ever

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous Value.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works and works well, and it keeps your head warm. Absolutely worth the 11 dollars I paid.
customer_reviews.author: dakota boucher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my fishing husband and one for my grandson. They both love it. It works well and is easy to operate. I did wash them already and they fit just like new.(remove the Bluetooth first of course).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for a Christmas gift. He loves it! Keeps his head warm and he loves that he can listen to his music wherever he goes!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother and Dad for Christmas. They absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my brother for Christmas, he says it's perfect! Comfortable and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Landshut

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I've bought as a gift because they are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: J.Noir

customer_reviews.title: Music is life!
customer_reviews.text: Great, I ordered two for gifts and I’m so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it for music, can’t get it to answer iPhone calls but who calls people anymore
customer_reviews.author: Laird Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great item fits really well Music volume is loud will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE FLOWERS

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Son uses on his motorcycle and at work. He lives them!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift swaps
customer_reviews.text: Went over very well for a Christmas gift swap. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Love highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this connects to phone Bluetooth battery life lasts a very very long time
customer_reviews.author: Greg weber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This Christmas gift for my nephew was a big hit. He is a golfer so it was ideal for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: Has made it a month with almost daily wear and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: jb23

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun beanie cap with music and that's a plus.
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest product. I love the fact that you can have a warm head and listen to your tunes at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Teneshia Geiger-Davis

product_meta.title: XIKEZAN Upgraded Unisex Knit Bluetooth Beanie Winter Music Hat Headphones w/Built-in Stereo Speaker Unique Christmas Tech Gag Gifts for Boyfriend/Him/Men/Teen Boys/Stocking Stuffers Friend Birthday
feature_bullets: 【LONGEST WORKING TIME】: The best battery offers continous working hours upto 15-20 hours per recharge(depends on volume) while other brands are 5-8 hours only.

【THE BEST CONNECTIVITY】: The best bluetooth chip with stable V4.2 technology sync to any bluetooth enabled device in seconds upto 33 feet without connectivity dropping while others' connectivity(including V5.0) may cut in and out.

【THE BIGGEST VOLUME OUTPUT】: The best speakers offer the best sound quality and the biggest volume output upto 120DB to enable you enjoy your playlist and take your calls in any noisy environment wihie others are 50-60DB only and can't drown out noise.

【DOUBLE THICKER】: The Double-knit material weighs 2.8oz,double thicker than others to keep your head warm in cold weather while others are only 1.4OZ.Washable,Unisex,soft and elastic mearial fits most head.Great Christmas gift for men,women,girls,boys.
【GREAT VALUE】: Comes with FREE knit gloves,comfortable and warm,No worrying about cold weather. All of the above advantages are assuring,we encourage you to compare.
